description:
Juvia and Meldy`s senses have been linked with Gray`s! Now, no matter which one of them is killed, Gray will die as well! Is there a way to escape from this love-hate triangle of death? Meanwhile, the second in command of Grimoire Heart joins the battle, making a grave situation even more weighty!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les larmes d`amour et de vie
Lágrimas De Amor E De Força!
